document.full_text: salva kiir mayardit, president of the breakaway region of southern sudan, declared on thursday that he would not go to war over the disputed abyei territory.
document.title: africa: south sudan leader tries to calm tempers over disputed territory
lines_and_colors: salva kiir mayardit, president of the breakaway region of southern sudan, declared on thursday that he would not go to war over the disputed abyei territory.
